title: Localized Abnormal Q Waves are not Associated with Echocardiographic Regional Wall Motion Abnormalities

abstract: The clinically intuitive, presumed association between localized Q waves in the electrocardiogram (ECG) and regional wall motion abnormalities on echocardiogram has not been investigated. This is noteworthy because Consensus Documents still …
